title: GetCurrentDisplayedModuleInstance (Function)
text:
FUNCTION GetCurrentDisplayedModuleInstance :
IModule
This function returns the instance whose page-visualization is displayed in the main frame. Might return 0.

rows.Name: iVisuClientId
rows.Comment:
The visu ClientID whose main frame is checked. Must be in
the range of VISU_MIN_NUMBER_OF_CLIENTS and
VISU_MAX_NUMBER_OF_CLIENTS.

rows:
A pointer to the environment of a module instance. Must not
be null.
